snippet.title: Kawaii Islands Official Trailer - The Anime Metaverse
snippet.description:
Kawaii Islands: the most enchanting play-to-earn game!

Kawaii Islands creates a fantasy universe on the cloud for multiplayers to experience a whole set of simulation gaming including designing, building, crafting, farming, social-networking. Especially, by gamifying several DeFi mechanisms, Kawaii Islands will bring players a new dimension of mixed entertainment and earning.
🔥 Web-version game: https://play.kawaii.global/ 
🔥 Litepaper: https://kawaii.global/litepaper.pdf
🔥 Introduction: https://blog.kawaii.global/introducing-kawaii-islands-concept-trailer-release-plan-and-latest-news-50ed8142f09e

👉 Website: https://kawaii.global
👉 Twitter: https://twitter.com/kawaii_islands
👉 Telegram: https://t.me/kawaii_islands  
👉 Telegram Announcement: https://t.me/kawaiiislands
👉 Discord: https://discord.com/invite/nN4FDesACB 
👉 Medium: https://blog.kawaii.global
👉 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/kawaii.islands.official 
👉 Subscribe to Newsletter: https://bit.ly/3CPyi0x
